ack.title: ACKNOWLEDGMENTS
ack.p: This work was supported by the Intramural Research Program of the National Institute of Allergy and Infectious Diseases, National Institutes of Health. K.-A.W. was supported by Defense Threat Reduction Agency contract HDTRA1-13-C-0055.
We thank the Comparative Medicine Branch (NIAID, NIH) for assistance with animal studies. We thank David M. Morens for helpful discussion.
